title: Need professional Amazon expert
snippet: I am looking for professional help (proven work experience and great past work reviews) to upload 3 new product collections onto Amazon. We have all the "raw material": product dimensions, rough product description, SKU, UPC, high-res pictures etc. However, we need to take it to the next level. Someone who knows the ins and outs of making a product stand out amidst hundreds of thousands. We also need someone who can work proactively and efficiently. Are you up to the challenge?
